channel.title: Quick web client question(web client is already made and works)
channel.description:
ok so i made my pi web client but when i try to do a emote it just stands there and when i walk it just slides across the ground?!?! and im thinking everything i will try to do my guy will be frozen and just slide across the ground like a statue on wheels ho do i fix this?!?!?!
oh and also id doesnt show the downloading cache 1%-100% its just a white screen and when cache is done downloading it goes to login screen

Got exactly same problem Can anyone help please?
